mapper.select: SELECT item_key, cust_id, cart_cnt, cart_rdate, option_key FROM cart

SELECT c.item_key, c.cust_id, c.cart_cnt, c.cart_rdate, c.option_key, i.item_name, i.item_price, i.item_img1, o.size, o.color, o.additional_price FROM cart c JOIN item i ON c.item_key = i.item_key LEFT JOIN `option` o ON c.option_key = o.option_key -- LEFT JOIN(옵션 없는 상품 고려) WHERE c.cust_id = #{custId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cust_id, item_key, cart_cnt, cart_rdate, option_key) VALUES (#{custId}, #{itemKey}, #{cartCnt}, NOW(), #{optionKey}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cart_cnt = cart_cnt + VALUES(cart_cnt)
